title: Does anyone know what the resource token is supposed to be?

comments.content: I was just wondering. Is it just an art piece or is it something from the LotR lore? it doesn't remind me of something in particular. Maybe it's an orb? A Palantir? But what is the ring around it?

What about Galadriel's mirror? The white bits could be reflected sunlight?

Or it could just be a nice looking token :) [//content.invisioncic.com/Mfantflight/emoticons/default_smile.png]

Edited November 6, 2018 by Stewart777
I just assumed it was a pearl-like gem in a setting.
